DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether folic acid supplementation effective arsenic lower chronic , low-level arsenic expose population .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Folic Acid Supplementation Arsenic Lowering
DOC.detailed_description: Outcome measure : Changes arsenic metabolite baseline week 8 Methods High-performance liquid chromatography ( HPLC )
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 year age chronically expose arsenic ( arsenic concentration drinking water > 10ug/L ) ; Population folic acid supplementation 2 week study ; Women childbearing age agree use reliable contraception method study ; Everyone volunteer participate sign informed consent . Pregnant breastfeeding woman ; Allergic folic acid ; Having clearly define allergic history ; Reported longterm use folic acid vitamin B ; Having obvious sign laboratory abnormality could affect efficacy folic acid ; Unsuitable participate study base judgment investigator ; Not agree cancel medication may affect serum folate concentration study period ; Subjects plan become pregnant study move area within study period ;
